text: Bruno Nicolè (; 24 February 1940 - 26 November 2019) was an Italian professional footballer. He played as a forward. He played for Juventus, Roma, and the national team. Nicolè died on 26 November 2019 in Pordenone, Italy at the age of 79.Addio a Nicolè, il più giovane marcatore e capitano della nazionale ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Footballers from Veneto Category:Sportspeople from Padua
title: Bruno Nicolè
